sections.name: NodeJS
sections.description: An introduction to fundamental coding concepts of programming in NodeJS.

units.name: NodeJS, Express, EJS
units.description: An overview of using NodeJS with Express and EJS for web development.

tasks.name: HTTP Server
tasks.description: Creating a simple HTTP server using Node.js.
tasks.genprompt: Generate multiple-choice questions. Each question has four answers. Write them in the question object format. The content of the question is about creating a simple HTTP server using Node.js. Focus on server creation, request handling, and response management.

questions.prompt: What is the primary purpose of Express.js in a Node.js application?
questions.correctAnswer: To provide a web application framework for handling HTTP requests and responses
answers: To provide a web application framework for handling HTTP requests and responses
